paper.title: Small-firm computing: motivators and inhibitors

author.org: (Department of Management Systems University of Waikato Hamilton, New Zealand )
Loughborough University Business School, Loughborough, England#TAB#

paper.publisher: Society for Information Management and The Management Information Systems Research Center
paper.abstract: This paper examines information system evolution in small firms. It focuses on applications growth, and uses the experiences of six small manufacturing firms to identify motivators and inhibitors of growth. Many factors were identified. Motivators of growth included improved enthusiasm for the technology. Inadequate resources and limited education about information systems were among the factors that inhibited application growth.
